title: [Large-scale] Language Creativity Enhancement Program through Generative AI-supported Fictional Generative Reading Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grammar and reading comprehension skills, with experience in simple creative writing
context.additional_context: Emphasizing group collaboration activities and project-based assessment through smartphone-based AI tools

learning_goals: Students can expand fiction stories over 1,500 characters using generative AI tools
Learners can present at least three creative variations of characters and plot developments through collaborative reading strategies
Participants can improve language fluency (vocabulary, sentence structure diversity) by over 30% compared to pre-assessment by incorporating AI-generated content

resources: Open-Source AI Creation Tools (e.g., PIXAI, NovelAI Lite Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
